title: Art of Love
detail: After learning that the art thief she has been chasing is her ex-lover, an officer working for Interpol concocts a plan to catch him red-handed.

title: Eye for an Eye 1
detail: Blind Cheng, a registered bounty hunter of board of punishments, meets Ni Yan, a restaurant daughter who suffered family massacre and personal rape. Onlooking Cheng is then involved into a struggle with darkness forces and steps on the road of justice seeking and revenge.

title: Eye for an Eye 2
detail: The blind swordsman, skilled in martial arts, named Cheng Xiazizi (played by Xie Miao), accidentally saves Zhang Xiaoyu (played by Yang Enyou), who has suffered from the destruction of his family. Under the persuasion of the orphan Xiaoyu, Cheng Xiazizi reluctantly keeps him by his side and teaches him skills. Xiaoyu also waits for the opportunity to seek revenge.

title: Kung Fu Panda 4
detail: After Po is tapped to become the Spiritual Leader of the Valley of Peace, he needs to find and train a new Dragon Warrior, while a wicked sorceress plans plans to re-summon all the master villains whom Po has vanquished to the spirit realm.

title: The Casagrandes Movie
detail: On a birthday trip to Mexico, 12-year-old Ronnie Anne accidentally frees a demigod trapped in a mountain and needs her family's help to set things right.

title: Dune
detail: Follows the mythic journey of Paul Atreides as he unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a path of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe, Paul endeavors to prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

title: Dune 2
detail: Follows the mythic journey of Paul Atreides as he unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a path of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe, Paul endeavors to prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

title: Lift
detail: An international heist crew, led by Cyrus Whitaker, race to lift $500 million in gold from a passenger plane at 40,000 feet.

title: Leo
detail: Leo the Lizard has been stuck in the same Florida school for decades. When he learns he only has one year left to live, he plans to escape to freedom, but instead has to rescue his class from their horribly mean substitute teacher.

title: Mavka: The Forest Song
detail: Young and naive forest spirit Mavka, develops feelings for a human musician, Lukas. As they grow closer to each other, an inevitable situation forces Mavka to choose between her love and her duty as a guardian of the forest.

title: Players
detail: New York sportswriter Mack devises successful hookup techniques with friend Adam and their crew, but when she unexpectedly falls head over heels for one of her targets, they all must learn what it takes to go from simply scoring to playing for...

title: Rewind
detail: After his wife passes away during a tumultuous period in their marriage, a man strikes a peculiar bargain that transports him to the past with the opportunity to mend their relationship, albeit at the cost of his own life.

title: The Tearsmith
detail: Sometimes one's greatest fear is accepting that someone can honestly love them for who they are. Nica and Rigel are ready to find it out together.

title: Ne Zha
detail: Ne Zha studies to acquire great skills to become a demon hunter. When he learns about his prophecy of becoming the destroyer of the world, he unwittingly transforms into his demonic form.

title: Love at First Sight
detail: On their flight from New York to London, Hadley and Oliver fall in love with each other. However, they lose each other at customs and the possibility of ever meeting each other again seems improbable, but destiny may have a way of changing the...

title: Tall Girl 2
detail: Jodi Kreyman deals with her newfound popularity. Her miscommunications, however, start causing rifts with those around her and now she really needs to "stand tall."

title: The Sea Beast
detail: Terrifying creatures roam the seas and the monster hunters are heroes. None is more beloved than the great Jacob Holland. When young Maisie Brumble joins his ship, he finds an unexpected ally.

title: Wind Breaker
detail: An admirer of strong people with a complete disinterest in the weak, Haruka Sakura, a loner and delinquent high school student, aims to be a fighter at the top of Furin High School. Coming from outside the city, Sakura enrols in Furin High...

title: ARK
detail: In a mysterious primeval land populated by dinosaurs and other extinct creatures, people from throughout human history have been resurrected. Following survivor Helena Walker after her initial awakening on The Island.

title: The Dangers in My Heart
detail: The Dangers in My Heart, or abbreviated as BokuYaba, is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Norio Sakurai. It began serialization in Weekly Sh≈çnen Champion in March 2018 and was moved to Champion Cross, before being moved again to...

title: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999
detail: Akane Kinoshita breaks up with her boyfriend after he cheats on her with a woman from an online game; she gets a makeover and joins her guild for an offline meetup when she meets Yamada face to face.

title: My Happy Marriage
detail: Miyo's abusive family deems her worthless, but together with her powerful husband-to-be, her true self and hidden powers begin to shine.

title: Rebel Moon
detail: When a colony on the edge of the galaxy finds itself threatened by the armies of the tyrannical Regent Balisarius, they dispatch a young woman with a mysterious past to seek out warriors from neighbouring planets to help them take a stand.
source: Rebel Moon - Part One A Child of Fire (2023).mkv

title: Rebel Moon ‚Äì Part Two: The Scargiver
detail: A colony on the edge of the galaxy fights for survival against a tyrannical ruling force, relying on the efforts of a small group of rebels.

title: Creed III
detail: Still dominating the boxing world, Adonis Creed is thriving in his career and family life. When Damian, a childhood friend and former boxing prodigy resurfaces after serving time in prison, he's eager to prove that he deserves his shot in the...

title: Immaculate
detail: An American nun embarks on a new journey when she joins a remote convent in the Italian countryside. However, her warm welcome quickly turns into a living nightmare when she discovers her new home harbours a sinister secret and unspeakable...

title: Imaginary
detail: When Jessica moves back into her childhood home with her family, her youngest stepdaughter, Alice, finds a stuffed bear named Chauncey. As Alice's behavior becomes more and more concerning, Jessica intervenes only to realize that Chauncey is much...

title: Chhorii
detail: Hemant and Sakshi, a married couple, are forced to move out of their home and seek refuge in a remote house. However, she soon experiences supernatural events which threaten her life.

title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
detail: Eddie Brock tries to revive his failing career by interviewing a serial killer, Cletus Kasady, who is on death row. When Carnage gains control over Cletus's body, he escapes from the prison.

title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
detail: Twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace move into Spiderwick Estate with their mother and sister. Once there, they find themselves surrounded by magical creatures.

title: Talk to Me
detail: When a group of friends discover how to conjure spirits with an embalmed hand, they become hooked on the new thrill and high-stakes party game -- until one of them goes too far and unleashes terrifying supernatural forces.

title: Knuckles
detail: Knuckles the Echidna teaches deputy Wade Whipple the techniques of the Echidna warrior.

title: Alita: Battle Angel
detail: Alita, a battle cyborg, is revived by Ido, a doctor, who realises that she actually has the soul of a teenager. Alita then sets out to learn about her past and find her true identity.
